content.question: Which of the following statements is correct when <math alttext="2.0 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="F e S, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext><mtext>e</mtext><mtext>S</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> reacts with <math alttext="4.0 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is the limiting reactant and <math alttext="2.0 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="S O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is formed.

<math alttext="O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is the limiting reactant and <math alttext="4.0 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn><mtext></mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="S O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is formed.

<math alttext="F e S, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext><mtext>e</mtext><mtext>S</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is the limiting reactant and <math alttext="4.0 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="S O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is formed.

<math alttext="F e S, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext><mtext>e</mtext><mtext>S</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is the limiting reactant and <math alttext="0.5 mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> remains unreacted.

content.answer: <math alttext="F e S, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>F</mtext><mtext>e</mtext><mtext>S</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is the limiting reactant and <math alttext="0.5 mole" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>o</mtext><mtext>l</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="O 2, gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> remains unreacted.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
